meanings.definition: The action or faculty of remembering something.
meanings.sent1: Her recollection of the party was vivid.
meanings.sent2: His recollection of the event was clear.
meanings.sent3: Grandma's recollection of her youth always brings a smile.
meanings.sent4: The recollection of her childhood flooded back like a wave.
meanings.sent5: The recollection of the song instantly brought back memories of her first dance.

meanings.sent1: The recollection of his name took a moment.
meanings.sent2: The recollection of the answer came to her suddenly.
meanings.sent3: The recollection of where she left her keys was a mystery.
meanings.sent4: The recollection of the lyrics eluded him.
meanings.sent5: The recollection of the smell triggered memories of her childhood home.
